setDescription(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets a user readable description for the current track.

Throws: if not called on an audio track
setAudioSampleRate(int).Description: Sets the audio sample rate, in the unit of Hz. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_AUDIO_E@ tracks.

Parameters: byte: The AFD code of the video.
Throws: if not called on a video track
setVideoActiveFormatDescription(byte).Description: Sets the Active Format Description (AFD) code of the video. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ tracks. This is needed for applications to be able to scale the video properly based on the information about where in the coded picture the active video is. The complete list of values are defined in ETSI TS 101 154 V1.7.1 Annex B, ATSC A/53 Part 4 and SMPTE 2016-1-2007.

Parameters: int: The width of the video.
Throws: if not called on a video track
setVideoWidth(int).Description: Sets the width of the video, in the unit of pixels. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ tracks.

Parameters: float: The frame rate of the video.
Throws: if not called on a video track
setVideoFrameRate(float).Description: Sets the frame rate of the video, in the unit fps (frames per rate). Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ tracks.

Parameters: float: The pixel aspect ratio of the video.
Throws: if not called on a video track
setVideoPixelAspectRatio(float).Description: Sets the pixel aspect ratio (the ratio of a pixel's width to its height) of the video. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ tracks. This is needed for applications to be able to scale the video properly for some video formats such as 720x576 4:3 and 720x576 16:9 where pixels are not square. By default, applications assume the value of 1.0 (square pixels), so it is not necessary to set the pixel aspect ratio for most video formats.

Parameters: int: The type of the track. Value is @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_AUDIO_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@, or @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_SUBTITLE_E@
String: The ID of the track that uniquely identifies the current track among all the other tracks in the same TV program. This value must never be null.
Throws: if the type is not any of @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_AUDIO_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ and @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_SUBTITLE_E@
TvTrackInfo.Builder(int,java.lang.String.Description: Create a @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#Builder_E@. Any field that should be included in the @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo_E@ must be added.

Parameters: int: The height of the video.
Throws: if not called on a video track
setVideoHeight(int).Description: Sets the height of the video, in the unit of pixels. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ tracks.

setExtra(android.os.Bundle).Description: Sets the extra information about the current track.

Throws: if not called on an audio track
setAudioChannelCount(int).Description: Sets the audio channel count. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_AUDIO_E@ tracks.

Parameters: String: The language string encoded by either ISO 639-1 or ISO 639-2/T.
setLanguage(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the language information of the current track.

Parameters: int: The type of the track.
String: The ID of the track that uniquely identifies the current track among all the other tracks in the same TV program.This value must never be null.
Throws: if the type is not any of @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_AUDIO_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_VIDEO_E@ and @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#TYPE_SUBTITLE_E@
TvTrackInfo.Builder(int, java.lang.Strin.Description: Create a @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo#Builder_E@. Any field that should be included in the @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo_E@ must be added.

build().Description: Creates a @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo_E@ instance with the specified fields.

ClassDesc: A builder class for creating @B_android#media#tv#TvTrackInfo_E@ objects.
